title: Butter Pepper & Masala Sweet corn 🌽 | Kids | Snack | Winter Treat ❄️
content:
Easy Snack recipe: Butter Pepper & Masala Sweet corn 🌽  Servings: 3 Duration: 15 mins Sweet corn is reliable to cook, you can make many varieties from corn kernels so today I prepared easy and quick snack recipe.. you can find on busy streets/ shopping malls or in theaters particularly in India you easily find this street food.. and if you love sweet corn then surely you like this recipe.. Any one of you doesn't try this, be quick to make it and enjoy 😊 You can checkout my sweet corn recipes in below links:

  • Sweet Corn 🌽 Vegetable Soup || Indo-Chinese Recipe

Ingredients:
  • Sweet corn kernels - Boiled & cooked - 350 gms
Butter Pepper Sweet corn:
  • Butter - 1/2 tb sp - melted
  • Fine black pepper powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Salt - as per taste
  • Lemon juice - 1 tsp
  • Sweet corn - 175 gms
Masala Sweet Corn:
  • Butter - 1/2 tb sp- melted
  • Red chilly powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Chaat Masala Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - as per taste
  • Lemon juice - 1 tsp
  • Sweet Corn - 175 gms
  • Nylon sev - 2 tb sp
Procedure: Butter Pepper Sweet Corn:
  • In a bowl Add cooked sweet corn
  • Add salt, butter, pepper powder and lemon juice
  • Mix well and if required adjust spices
  • Serve immediately in bowl/ cup
Masala Sweet Corn:
  • In a bowl Add cooked sweet corn
  • Add salt, butter, red chilly powder, chaat masala powder and lemon juice
  • Mix well and if required adjust spices
  • Serve immediately in bowl/ cup
